Articles.Content:
So today I got board and made a new fighter

Yes this is a replica of a Mig 21

Light weight, really fast for it being single engine (140m/s after take off)

Comes with working missiles

only problem I have with it is how bad at turning it is

I fixed its turning radius and it extremely nimble now

I wish I had a joystick to fly it better now.

I crash almost everytime on landing because I can get it leveled out

Like i said you put your command pod right next to the engines so all i have to do is keep the ball on it. I did manage to get going a bit faster this time 35 extra kms made a big difference.

but there is a reason it's there. If it was in the center you would have broken the Drek in half.
is there a drek missing
I could have sworn there were 3 drek and i only killed 2.

I could have sworn there were 3 drek and i only killed 2.

(tenchar)
Tenchar? What is that there was a Child of darkness or something like that.
...here's an idea we move the discusion to an IRC and leave this place for just battle stuff....

Tenchar? What is that there was a Child of darkness or something like that.

tenchar means ten characters (KSP forums limit)

never mind i found it. Disguising it as debris so it does not show up on my list.

Would that be considered an exploit?

Edited November 6, 2013 by camulus777

never mind i found it. Disguising it as debris so it does not show up on my list.

lol i could hear the panick in your tone It worked for a little while...

You realize the Dreks are just distractions, the Fifteen-IIs are getting everything done...

I really love them. They've performed admirably, well above and beyond the call of duty...

lol i could hear the panick in your tone It worked for a little while...

You realize the Dreks are just distractions, the Fifteen-IIs are getting everything done...

I really love them. They've performed admirably, well above and beyond the call of duty...

Speaking of Call of Duty...didn't CoD Ghost come out today

They have yet to take a hit yet and so far your distraction has worked in my favor. Each of my ships still have their light missiles and a very high delta V.

To be honest though i was more panicked that it had been destroyed by a glitch and we would have to do this all over agn. lol

Speaking of Call of Duty...didn't CoD Ghost come out today

yes...

They have yet to take a hit yet and so far your distraction has worked in my favor. Each of my ships still have their light missiles and a very high delta V.

To be honest though i was more panicked that it had been destroyed by a glitch and we would have to do this all over agn. lol

yeah, well, you'd be surprised how strong the fifteens are... seriously they are strong, like little baby Dreks. Plus, I think the Riley and the Newcastle can both limp, so i'd say i'm winning.
i duno if its not KSP it does not exist.

yes...

.....

do you have it

if so is it good?

A bit more speed and even more effective.

Yes they can fire but are without engines, so as long as i stay away from them out of the 2.5 firing range i should be fine.

File

NOOOOO my Child of Darkness!

You are going to die now...

Your move. Heimdall down. Two for Jaguar.

And yes that ship id dead. D-E-D. Cockpit was blown away.

http://www./?xoz5s8nrl0cctf7
So, how many mobile ships left now each?

So, how many mobile ships left now each?

two each, but all three dreks can move if i flip the missiles, which isn't hard nor unrealistic to do...

lol, mine plug in the back so you don't have to go backwards.

And what are the rules regarding ammo salvage?

lol, mine plug in the back so you don't have to go backwards.

And what are the rules regarding ammo salvage?

...except the entire rear of my Dreks is gone.

And i think you can salvage ammo from an enemy's ship if the ship is dead, and there is no rule to swapping ammo between your own ships.

what about free floating probes?
